author: @sf_resident
content: Huge fire near the Ferry Building! Lots of black smoke, sirens everywhere. Avoid the area!

author: BayAreaEvents
content: Don't miss the free concert in Golden Gate Park this afternoon! Great music and food trucks.

author: @commuter_life
content: Major accident on the Bay Bridge, eastbound lanes are completely blocked. Traffic is a nightmare.

author: @concerned_cit
content: Just saw a group of people vandalizing the new mural on Valencia. Someone should call the police.

author: foodie_sf
content: Amazing new brunch spot in the Mission! The pancakes are to die for. #sfeats #brunch

author: @runner_dave
content: My car was just broken into near Alamo Square. They stole my laptop. Be careful out there.

author: SF Shop Local
content: Big summer sale starts today at all our downtown locations! Up to 50% off.

author: @jenny_s
content: There's some kind of emergency services response at the 16th St BART station. Multiple police cars and an ambulance.

author: @sf_observer
content: Sounds like there was a loud explosion around the Dogpatch area. Anyone else hear that? A little scary.

author: Marina Neighborhood Watch
content: Reports of suspicious activity on Lombard Street. A person was seen looking into parked cars. Please stay vigilant.
